scripts.comment: A few examples using the block can be found below. They should all report "true" once the block is working :)

custom-block.l: Eat All Day, Go Bed Early

scripts.comment: Given a short phrase, can you report the acronym for it? As a reminder, an acronym is a new word made up of the first letter of each word in the original phrase. For example, "Greatest Of All Time" = "GOAT" Edit the block to the left to get started!
Once the acronym block has been completed, the following is a simple game using the new block!

list.l: Can you make up a phrase with the acronym "

event.arg: Eat All Day, Go Bed Early
<comment collabId="item_29" x="226.5" y="30.416666666666657" w="90" collapsed="false">add comment here...</comment>
Edit the block to the left to get started!
<script><custom-block collabId="item_31" s="acronym for %txt"><l>Eat All Day, Go Bed Early</l></custom-block></script>
Eat All Day, Go Bed Early
<comment collabId="item_35" x="108" y="185.41666666666666" w="90" collapsed="false">add comment here...</comment>
A few examples using the block can be found below. They should all report "true" once the block is working :)
<script><block collabId="item_43" s="reportEquals"><custom-block collabId="item_43_1" s="acronym for %txt"><l>Eat All Day, Go Bed Early</l></custom-block><l>EADGBE</l></block></script>
Eat All Day, Go Bed Early
<script><block collabId="item_47" s="reportEquals"><custom-block collabId="item_47_1" s="acronym for %txt"><l>Eat All Day, Go Bed Early</l></custom-block><l>EADGBE</l></block></script>
Eat All Day, Go Bed Early
<script><block collabId="item_50" s="reportEquals"><custom-block collabId="item_50_1" s="acronym for %txt"><l>You Only Live Once</l></custom-block><l>YOLO</l></block></script>

Given a short phrase, can you report the acronym for it? As a reminder, an acronym is a new word made up of the first letter of each word in the original phrase.
For example, "Greatest Of All Time" = "GOAT"
Edit the block to the left to get started!
Edit the block to the left to get started!
<comment collabId="item_58" x="463" y="153.91666666666666" w="90" collapsed="false">add comment here...</comment>
Once the acronym block has been completed, the following is a short script to generate acronyms interactively!
Once the acronym block has been completed, the following is a simple game using the new block!
Once the acronym block has been completed, the following is a short script to generate acronyms interactively!

<script><block collabId="item_79" s="reportMap"><block collabId="item_79_1" s="reifyReporter"><autolambda><block collabId="item_82" s="reportUnicodeAsLetter"><block collabId="item_81" s="reportVariadicSum"><list><l>64</l><l></l></list></block></block></autolambda><list></list></block><block collabId="item_77" s="reportNumbers"><l>1</l><l>26</l></block></block></script>
Can you make up a phrase with the acronym "
